column4: what can i do from this grub rescue> to be able to launch my cds? my bios is set properly too
you need to know what the drive designation of the cd player first.
yeah but how? i can only use ls from that grub rescue, and it shows me 5 partitions including the (hd0)
what does BIOS say it is?
Let me check that out, not sure if it says anything about it you mean the driver name or what?
I saw what I was doing wrong!
you have the grub prompt up on the machine in question?
yes but now it is working thank you for your patience and attention, it was my bios... it somehow changed the boot order again...
i feel like those lames now haha
yes, but to give you some info... grub is very powerful.
Really? I see lots of nice enhancement in this grub2 :) I was just scared it would not let me have my laptop again working properly!
